channel.title: Timbre on Demystify FP
channel.description: Recent content in Timbre on Demystify FP

item.title: Configuring Logging Using Timbre
item.description: In the first two blog posts of the blog series Building an E-Commerce Marketplace Middleware in Clojure, we learnt how to bootstrap a Clojure project using Mount & Aero and how to configure database connection pooling & database migration along with reloaded workflow. We are going to continue setting up the infrastructure, and in this blog post, we are going to take up logging using Timbre. Timbre is a Clojure/Script logging library that enables to configure logging using a simple Clojure map.
